effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the user’s fire type after damage calculation. If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the user’s fire type after damage calculation. If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the user’s fire type after damage calculation. If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: Removes the user’s fire type after inflicting damage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Removes the user’s fire type after inflicting damage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Removes the user’s fire type after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.
